level.heading: Limitations upon the return on capital.

level.text: The return upon capital shall not exceed 6% per annum upon the paid-up capital and shall be noncumulative.
Total return upon capital distributed for any single period shall not exceed 50% of the net savings for that period.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
